Message.Msg: Starve the beast was the program. Republicans ran spending up on in order to collapse the economy and did it. Clinton saved it once and now Obama has the job. There will be spending cuts slowly as more jobs are created. Fewer new big expensive defense programs and roll back in government jobs just as there has been for the past 4 years. The need to deal with Iran is the big problem in keeping future costs down. . It was the Neocon ambition to rid us of social programs, give more power to the rich and dominate the world as the only superpower in a "New World Order". I doubt Reagan as a tool for Bectel or Bush led by Haliburton even realized what the agenda was. Bush Sr. and the Carlyle group knew. They still strive for a government ruled by industry and military dominating the world. Same old feudalism on a world scale. The biggest victory so far was getting industries declared to have the same rights as people while keeping those who run them immune from prosecution for what they do.

Message.Msg: Texas governor Rick Perry knows how to start a rumble. Message.Title: Words from a Columbine Parent.
Message.Msg: Since the dawn of creation there has been both good & evil in the hearts of men and women. We all contain the seeds of kindness or the seeds of violence. The death of my wonderful daughter, Rachel Joy Scott, and the deaths of that heroic teacher, and the other eleven children who died must not be in vain. Their blood cries out for answers." "The first recorded act of violence was when Cain slew his brother Abel out in the field. The villain was not the club he used.. .Neither was it the NCA, the National Club Association. The true killer was Cain, and the reason for the murder could only be found in Cain's heart." "In the days that followed the Columbine tragedy, I was amazed at how quickly fingers began to be pointed at groups such as the NRA. I am not a member of the NRA. I am not a hunter. I do not even own a gun. I am not here to represent or defend the NRA - because I don't believe that they are responsible for my daughter's death. "Therefore , I do not believe that they need to be defended. If I believed they had anything to do with Rachel's murder I would be their strongest opponent." "I am here today to declare that Columbine was not just a tragedy -- it was a spiritual event that should be forcing us to look at where the real blame lies! Much of the blame lies here in this room. Much of the blame lies behind the pointing fingers of the accusers themselves. I wrote a poem just four nights ago that expresses my feelings best." "TO MANY OF OUR ELECTED REPRESENTATIVES Your laws ignore our deepest needs, Your words are empty air. You've stripped away our heritage, You've outlawed simple prayer. Now gunshots fill our classrooms, And precious children die. You seek for answers everywhere, And ask the question "Why?" You regulate restrictive laws, Through legislative creed. And yet you fail to understand, That God is what we need!" "Men and women are three-part beings. We all consist of body, mind, and spirit. When we refuse to acknowledge a third part of our mak
